00018         // Similar to SSYVersionNumbersComparisonResult:
00019         SSYDowngradeMajor = -4,
00020         SSYDowngradeMinor = -3,
00021         SSYDowngradeBugFix = -2,
00022         SSYDowngrade = -1,  // unspecified if bugFix, minor or major
00023         SSYCurrentRev = 0,
00024         SSYUpgrade = 1,  // unspecified if bugFix, minor or major
00025         SSYUpgradeBugFix = 2,
00026         SSYUpgradeMinor = 3,
00027         SSYUpgradeMajor = 4,
00028

00031         SSYNotDefined = NSNotFound
00032 } ;
